Wisdom: سَلُوا اللَّهَ الْعَفْوَ وَالْعَافِيَةَ وَحُسْنَ التَّوْفِيقِ
enWisdom: Ask Allah for forgiveness, well-being and good success [in carrying out His ordinances]

Wisdom: نَسْأَلُ اللَّهَ سُبْحَانَهُ مَنَازِلَ الشُّهَدَاءِ وَمُعَايَشَةَ السُّعَدَاءِ وَمُرَافَقَةَ الْأَنْبِيَاءِ وَالْأَبْرَارِ
enWisdom: We ask Allah, the Glorified, for [our inclusion in] the ranks of the martyrs, the fellowship of the felicitous and the company of the Prophets and the virtuous ones
